reviewText: This video met my expectations.  I used it in the college course that I teach (Introduction to Corrections & Law Enforcement)  As a retired warden, the video depicted the reality of being locked in supermax.

really enjoyed watching this, I am always looking for documentaries like this one, truly a must see, this here will take you on a trip to a very dark place. If you are a fan of MSNBC Lock up , you will love this.
This movie was interesting and I recommend it to anyone who has questions on prison life or life as a CO.

Because of my job (paralegal for a defense attorney), I have actually been behind the bars of this prison (and many others)and have met with Lifer prisoners quite frequently.  I had considered being a Corrections Officer, but this showed me a side of prison life I had not been privey to....one I don't want to be a part of on a daily basis.  Scarey stuff.
